page.title: 16A Day in My Life in Ingleton
page.content: This is a typical day in my life. This morning I awoke at 8.00am.I had cornflakes for my breakfast,I followed this with two digestive biscuits and a cup of tea. I left for school at 8.30am and arrived at school at 8.45am.School started at 9.00am and for the first quarter of an hour I read my book. I followed this by writing my play for our final assembly of the year,my play was about a fire in school.We pretended there was a fire in the hall and we discussed how we would deal with it.My next lesson was mathematics and we all worked out on which day of the week we were born using a formula. My date of birth is 16th December 1974 and I worked out that I was born on a Monday.At 12 noon it was time for dinner, I have school dinners and on this day we had risotto and for pudding we had semolina.
